name: Ancient Amele Simulator
description:
Ancient Amele Simulator is a first person action game where you protect stationary statues from incoming magic missiles by building brick walls around them. You craft these bricks from clay things scattered around.

Instructions:
WASD / Mouse : Move / Look
Shift : Sprint
Mouse1 : Grab item
Mouse2 : Put item down
Alt (with brick) : Rotate
F (hold) (with brick) : Snap to other bricks

Github repo here
